snippet: On March 5, 1946, Winston Churchill delivered his famous "Iron Curtain" speech, officially titled "Sinews of Peace," at Westminster College in Fulton, Mo.
abstract: On March 5, 1946, Winston Churchill delivered his famous "Iron Curtain" speech, officially titled "Sinews of Peace," at Westminster College in Fulton, Mo.

headline.main: March 5, 1946 | Winston Churchill Warns of Soviet "Iron Curtain"
